description: This file defines the EcsCluster class, a subclass of AwsResource, which manages AWS ECS clusters including creation, reading, deletion, and retrieval of cluster details. It includes methods for interacting with AWS via boto3, handling cluster attributes, and logging.

classes.name: EcsCluster
classes.description: Represents an AWS ECS Cluster with methods to create, read, delete, and retrieve cluster information, extending the AwsResource base class.

methods.name: get_ecs_cluster_name
methods.description: Returns the ECS cluster name, defaulting to 'name' if 'ecs_cluster_name' is not set.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates an ECS cluster using AWS API, with parameters based on class attributes, and logs the process.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads the ECS cluster details from AWS, updating the active_resource if the cluster is found and active.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the ECS cluster via AWS API and logs the process.

methods.name: get_arn
methods.description: Retrieves the ARN of the ECS cluster by reading its details from AWS.
